name: Emby
short_description: Media server for streaming video, music, live TV, and photos.
description: Media server for streaming video, music, live TV, and photos. Emby is a self-hosted application focused on media, entertainment, streaming, video. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Emby on your home server to media server for streaming video, music, live tv, and photos without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Emby to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
